mapper.select: select no, category, kind, color, age, care_addr as careAddr, shelter, shelter_tel as shelterTel, neuter_yn as neuterYn, happen_place, happenPlace, process_state as processState, sum_img as sumImg, img, notice_sdt as noticeSdt, notice_edt as noticeEdt, descr, weight, sex_cd as sexCd from shelnimal where no < #{no}

select no, category, kind, color, age, care_addr as careAddr, shelter, shelter_tel as shelterTel, neuter_yn as neuterYn, happen_place, happenPlace, process_state as processState, sum_img as sumImg, img, notice_sdt as noticeSdt, notice_edt as noticeEdt, descr, weight, sex_cd as sexCd from shelnimal WHERE notice_edt >= #{sdt}

select no, category, kind, color, age, care_addr as careAddr, shelter, shelter_tel as shelterTel, neuter_yn as neuterYn, happen_place as happenPlace, process_state as processState, sum_img as sumImg, img, notice_sdt as noticeSdt, notice_edt as noticeEdt, descr, weight, sex_cd as sexCd from shelnimal WHERE no is not null
AND category = '%'||#{category}||'%'
AND kind = '%'||#{kind}||'%'
AND color = '%'||#{color}||'%'
AND age = '%'||#{age}||'%'
AND neuter_yn = '%'||#{neuterYn}||'%'
AND process_state = '%'||#{processState}||'%'
AND descr = '%'||#{descr}||'%'
AND sex_cd = '%'||#{sexCd}||'%'
AND notice_sdt < #{noticeSdt}
AND notice_edt > #{noticeEdt}
